name: Evil Rise
description:
One fine day, several heroes were trained and sent around the world. But a EVIL woke up, and now he wants to hunt the heroes.

Can you beat all the heroes and end the princess?

Control Keys:

Arrows = Move

Space Bar = Jump

CTRL = Attack

X = Open Chest

ESC = Exit Game

ALT + Enter = Full Screen/ Windows Screen

Enter = Restart Game

Game made for Jam
